Rodrigo Mariscal is a senior research analyst at the [Institute of International Finance](https://www.iif.com/). He has worked at the [IMF's](http://www.imf.org/external/index.htm) Western Hemisphere Department, the [Inter-American Development Bank](https://www.iadb.org/), and the [Central Bank of Mexico](http://www.banxico.org.mx/). Mr. Mariscal holds an M.A. in economics from [El Colegio de Mexico](https://www.colmex.mx/). His research focuses on macroeconomics, with emphasis on the credibility of inflation regimes in Latin America, sovereign debt restructurings, and commodity prices. He has also worked on income distribution and labor productivity in North America.
